div.head: 大小便秘
div.div: major and minor relief blocked; stools and urine are blocked

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major and minor relief blocked; stools and urine are blocked

sense.def: IS, Pathological Condition Combined Designation of xiao bian mi 小便秘 , blocked urine, and da bian mi 大便秘 , blocked stools. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 14: 傷寒，大小便秘 , “Harm caused by cold. Stools and urine are blocked ”.
